name: Mottakopf from Brand Innertal
description: A challenging hike requiring excellent fitness and sure-footedness. Mostly well-maintained trails. The starting point is accessible by public transportation.

route.name: Mottakopf
route.description: From up here, you can enjoy a breathtaking view of the surrounding peaks of the Rätikon mountain range in good weather.

route.name: Sonnenlaganthütte
route.description: At this hut, you will find a fantastic view and a peaceful place to take a break.

route.name: View towards Lünersee
route.description: A beautiful hiking trail along the slopes of Mottakopf with stunning panoramas. From here, you have a great view of Lünersee.
